name: Code First Girls
description: Working hard to get more women into tech and entrepreneurship

name: UX for Change
description: #UX4Change is a platform dedicated to Share the Goodness of UX to Change the World, by enabling charities & the public sector to design user centric experiences

name: Women Hack for Non-Profits
description: Community of women building open source projects for non-profit organisations and charities. Learn to code and work on real life projects :)

name: Mums In Technology
description: An immersive learning experience in partnership with Industry.Explore, Learn, Connect and be Inspired.As featured in MT,Sunday Times & The Guardian

name: EmpowerHack
description: Bringing people together to build solutions empowering women and girls in humanitarian contexts and creating sustainable tech that crosses borders
